item.title: Jimmy Cliff, Jamaican reggae star and actor, dead at 81
item.description: Jimmy Cliff was 81, according to his official Instagram account.

item.title: Russia launches deadly attack on Kharkiv amid 'productive' US-Ukraine talks
item.description: At least four people were killed and 17 injured in Ukraine's northeastern city of Kharkiv in what the local mayor called a “massive” Russian drone att...

item.title: Death toll climbs in Southeast Asia as heavy rains cause floods and landslides
item.description: Heavy rains have caused deadly flooding and landslides in Southeast Asia

item.title: WATCH: Roommates help rescue Vietnam vet stuck in California floodwaters
item.description: A pair of roommates helped rescue a Vietnam veteran as his car floated away in floodwaters in Southern California early on Friday morning.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump congratulates NYC mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani after WH meeting
